content.title: Acute Limb Ischemia Treatment Algorithm
content.description: Evidence-based approach to managing acute limb ischemia based on severity classification and patient factors.

initial_management.anticoagulation: Immediate IV heparin (5000-10000 units bolus, drip)
initial_management.imaging: Duplex or CTA if time permits

category_III.rationale: Reperfusion of non-viable tissue risks MODS

reperfusion_syndrome.pathophysiology: Ischemia-reperfusion injury releases myoglobin, potassium, lactate
reperfusion_syndrome.prevention: Mannitol, bicarbonate, adequate hydration, fasciotomy if indicated
